title: Easy: Sum of Odd Numbers
description:
Write a function that calculates the sum of all odd numbers from 1 to n.
#### Function Signature
```python
def sum_odd_numbers(n: int) -> int:
```
#### Input
- `n` (int): A positive integer representing the upper limit for the range.
#### Output
- Returns the sum of all odd numbers from 1 to `n`.\
